TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NamespaceDeclaration extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 XAML 命名空间声明标识符和前缀，方法是将这些字符串值存储为单独的属性。

span.span: Declares the identifier and the prefix of a XAML namespace by storing these string values as separate properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 XAML 节点流的一部分的 XAML 命名空间信息。 represents XAML namespace information as part of a XAML node stream. 类是不是真正的对象或成员的节点类型; 相反，它是离散的节点类型。The class is a node type that is not truly an object or member; instead, it is a discrete node type. 在 XAML 节点流中，对象或对其应用该 XAML 命名空间的成员之前遇到。In the XAML node stream, a is encountered just prior to the object or member to which that XAML namespace applies. 按照约定，标识符的 XAML 命名空间类似于统一资源标识符 (URI)。By convention, the identifier of a XAML namespace resembles a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 但是，属性属于类型。However, the property of is of type . Api 的.NET Framework XAML 服务通常将视为字符串的 XAML 命名空间标识符。The APIs of .NET Framework XAML Services usually treat XAML namespace identifiers as strings. 相对路径与绝对区别 true类型是用于标识 XAML （或 XML） 的命名空间不相关。The relative versus absolute distinctions in the true type are irrelevant for identifying a XAML (or XML) namespace. URI 作为命名空间约定也是在 XML 中典型的。The URI-as-namespace convention is also typical in XML. 此类型的对象用作输入方法时写入到对象图的 XAML 节点流信息。Objects of this type are used as input for the method when writing XAML node stream information into an object graph. 此类型的对象用作输入XAML 节点流的形式写入信息 XML 序列化的方法。Objects of this type are used as input for the method when writing XAML node stream information as XML for serialization. 命名空间声明可能具有的前缀值。A namespace declaration may have a value for the prefix. A前缀表示的默认 XAML 命名空间声明。A prefix represents a declaration of the default XAML namespace.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string ns, string prefix) cil managed
Public Sub New (ns As String, prefix As String)

param.name: ns
param.span: 以字符串形式指定的 XAML 命名空间标识符。

span.span: The XAML namespace identifier, as a string.

param.name: prefix
param.span: 在前缀映射中用于命名空间的字符串前缀。

span.span: The string prefix that is used for the namespace in prefix mappings.

summary.span: 使用初始属性值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using initial property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化不会尝试验证值。Initialization of does not attempt to validate values. 若要正确使用 XAML 编写器，请使用 null 值。To correctly use a XAML writer, do not use null values. 命名空间声明可能具有的前缀值。A namespace declaration may have a value for the prefix. A前缀表示的默认 XAML 命名空间声明。A prefix represents a declaration of the default XAML namespace.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Namespace As String
public: property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 的标识符组成部分。

span.span: Gets the identifier component of a .

value.span: XAML 命名空间声明的标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the XAML namespace declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按照约定，标识符 XAML 命名空间类似于统一资源标识符 (URI)。By convention, the identifier for a XAML namespace resembles a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). Api 的.NET Framework XAML 服务通常将视为字符串的 XAML 命名空间标识符。The APIs of .NET Framework XAML Services usually treat XAML namespace identifiers as strings. 相对路径与绝对区别 true类型是用于标识 XAML （或 XML） 的命名空间不相关。The relative versus absolute distinctions in the true type are irrelevant for identifying a XAML (or XML) namespace. URI 作为命名空间约定也是在 XML 中典型的。The URI-as-namespace convention is also typical in XML.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Prefix As String
public: property System::String ^ Prefix { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用作 的 XAML 命名空间映射前缀的前缀。

span.span: Gets the prefix that is used as the XAML namespace mapping prefix for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间声明可能具有的前缀值。A namespace declaration may have a value for the prefix. A前缀表示的默认 XAML 命名空间声明。A prefix represents a declaration of the default XAML namespace.
